Требуемый опыт работы: более 6 лет

Полная занятость, Вахтовый метод

Обязанности:
  • Quality Advisor’s role is to support in implementing and monitoring processes to ensure project quality objectives and strategies are met, which enable long term reliability, sustainable production, and effective process safety management. Also act as a discipline SME for all Quality Control activities.

Требования:

  • Education (Diploma): Technical Degree

    Relevant Experience: Insulation and fireproofing is a must

    Qualifications\Certification: Certificate NACE 2

    e.g. Communication Skills: English speaking

Ключевые навыки
